item.title: Jack Black, Fred Armisen, Margaret Cho Take on Go-Go’s Classics at Backyard Benefit
item.description: The Musack Foundation, which sources instruments for kids, drew luminaries from music and comedy to its annual carnival fundraiser on Aug. 23.

item.title: ‘Deli Boys’ Renewed for Second Season at Hulu
item.description: Fred Armisen is also joining the cast of the comedy series.

item.title: ‘Fixed’ Review: Genndy Tartakovsky’s Netflix Animated Feature Is a Hilariously Dirty Delight
item.description: Adam DeVine, Idris Elba and Kathryn Hahn are among the voice cast for the comedy about a pet dog who enlists his canine friends for one last wild evening before he’s taken to get neutered.
